message: Yes! I've already needed to look back at a comment I made but couldn't easily remember the topic.
Good idea, it would be good if you can click on all of the numbers in the stats here https://convore.com/users/dag/ and see a list of them
Similarly, within a group, I'd like a tab toggle (like the public/all groups one) thats lets me switch between topics I started, that I've commented on, or all of them.
I like it... Similar to my history idea https://convore.com/feedback/suggested-feature-history/
